title: What is Corki's weakness?
body:
He has enough range to compete with Xerath midlane...

He has the power scaling of an ADC (because, you know, he is one)

He has a long-range gapcloser/escape...

Heck, he even has waveclear,

And to top it all off, he deals mixed damage.

This isn't a rant, this is a serious question.  What is his weakness?  As it stands, when he goes mid, he's like a Xerath - but with enough mobility to be ungankable, and you can't itemize efficiently against him...
